Learning-outcomes.item: Declare and use various data types in the C# environment.
Properly use the different looping structures available in C#.
Write an amortization schedule or the future value of monthly investment program to demonstrate the capabilities of looping.
Develop and use classes, objects, methods and attributes.
Write programs involving single and multidimensional arrays.
Write object based programs showing proper use of inheritance and polymorphism.
Write programs using different types of file structures available to C#.
